00020 #include "calvin_files/writers/test/CelFileWriterTest.h"
00021 //
00022 #include "calvin_files/writers/src/CalvinCelFileWriter.h"
00023 //

00025 using namespace std;
00026 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00027 
00028 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( CelFileWriterTest );
00029 
00030 void CelFileWriterTest::setUp() {}
00031 
00032 void CelFileWriterTest::tearDown() {}
00033 
00034 void CelFileWriterTest::testCreation()
00035 {
00036         CelFileData fHdr("cel_file");
00037         CelFileWriter* w = new CelFileWriter(fHdr);
00038         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00039         delete w;
00040 }
00041 
00042 void CelFileWriterTest::WriteTest()
00043 {
00044         std::string celFileName = "cel_file";
00045         CelFileData writerData(celFileName);
00046         writerData.SetIntensityCount(10);
00047         writerData.SetStdDevCount(10);
00048         writerData.SetPixelCount(10);
00049         writerData.SetOutlierCount(10);
00050         writerData.SetMaskCount(10);
00051 
00052     writerData.SetArrayType(L"arraytype");
00053     writerData.SetMasterFileName(L"masterfile");
00054     writerData.SetLibraryPackageName(L"libpackage");
00055 
00056         CelFileWriter writer(writerData);
00057 
00058         FloatVector intensities;
00059         intensities.push_back(10.0);
00060         intensities.push_back(11.0);
00061         intensities.push_back(12.0);
00062         intensities.push_back(13.0);
00063         writer.WriteIntensities(intensities);
00064         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00065 
00066         FloatVector stdDevs;
00067         stdDevs.push_back(10.0);
00068         stdDevs.push_back(11.0);
00069         stdDevs.push_back(12.0);
00070         stdDevs.push_back(13.0);
00071         writer.WriteStdDevs(stdDevs);
00072         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00073 
00074         Int16Vector pixels;
00075         pixels.push_back(10);
00076         pixels.push_back(11);
00077         pixels.push_back(12);
00078         pixels.push_back(13);
00079         writer.WritePixels(pixels);
00080         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00081 
00082         CelFileData readerData;
00083         CelFileReader reader;
00084         reader.SetFilename(celFileName);
00085         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(readerData));
00086 
00087         // Read some data
00088         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(readerData.GetFileHeader()->GetFilename() == celFileName);
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(readerData.HasNumPixels());
00090         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(readerData.HasStdev());
00091 
00092     
00093     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(readerData.GetArrayType() == L"arraytype");
00094     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(readerData.GetMasterFileName() == L"masterfile");
00095     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(readerData.GetLibraryPackageName() == L"libpackage");
00096 }
